dialogue: Keep it up, kid. I think you're gonna be a star.
Set your eyes on the furthest star, and let that be your goal.
Settle for nothing less than excellence in everything you do.
There's more to this world than meets the eye, kid.
I got to where I am through the force of pure willpower, kid.
I'm always behind the curtain, making sure the show is interesting.
Keep working hard and maybe you'll end up like me someday.
Never stop striving to achieve perfection.
Welcome! Hey, you look like the new farmer that Emily wrote to me about. $name, right?
Hello hello! I'm so glad that you made it, $name. I was starting to get bored in here!
Welcome to the Oasis, $name! The air conditioning in here sure feels nice, doesn't it?
Hi there, $name! I was starting to think you'd never show up. Stay as long as you like!
Don't worry about that shady-looking guy in the back. He just makes sure people read the ${rules_link} before letting them into some kind of "club".
Yep, it's just me, all alone... well, except for that guy in the back. He guards some sort of "club", and only lets people in if they've read the ${rules_link}.

MEMBER_RENAMED.dialogue: $name is now going by another name.
